3hFALmRUrF.name: Update
3hFALmRUrF.message:
Braains.io Jungle Update!

# NEW CONTENT!
- New *Jungle Map* extension at the bottom of the map!
- New Blowdart item that can be purchased by pressing [B] in the swamp biome

# BALANCING
- Bat, stick, and PG item physics have been altered: it is now very difficult to push objects through walls with these items.
- Swordfish and drumstick are unaltered

# COMMUNITY
- Verified Youtuber badges are back! The ‚≠ê badge appears in front of verified content creators in game.

# MISC
- Shrek?

potatoGun.description: Shoots powerful potatoes for 25 points eachü•î 1/10 chance of getting a Hot Potato Gun instead!
potatoGun.name: Potato Gun

baseballBat.description: Use this expensive stick to move objects
baseballBat.name: Stick

PBOMyFpPs8.description: Useful for moving big objects. Skilled players can use this weapon to *grab* objects
PBOMyFpPs8.name: Swordfish

6T5fWSolir.description: Click on the screen to use. Lowers your chance to become the first zombie
6T5fWSolir.name: Pill

nidc3swP0c.description: Use the baseball bat to move objects
nidc3swP0c.name: Baseball Bat

d73qo6nov5.name: Shotgun
d73qo6nov5.description: Very useful for running and possibly jumping through the walls..

rqozsVPYzA.description: The drumstick is very thick. +40% bonus each round (yummy)
rqozsVPYzA.name: Drumstick

qE1U7TYQws.name: kickWand (mod only)
qE1U7TYQws.description: onClick kicks all guest users within < 100px of item-unit joint. isDestroyed onDrop. For moderation use only.

kmlcswCj9U.description: The spear recoils zombies! Great for juking, but can be a bit tricky to master
kmlcswCj9U.name: Spear

qivW93U4XC.description: The dev drumstick is very very thick.
qivW93U4XC.name: Dev Drumstick

7n2xQC30K4.description: Each dart slows down zombies for a short time.
7n2xQC30K4.name: Blowdart

LVCSbgNCMq.description: Very rare item. +80% bonus each round (yummy)
LVCSbgNCMq.name: Very Rare Golden Drumstick

lRmdy3Vy8Y.description: Rare spear is stronger! Great for juking, but can be a bit tricky to maste
lRmdy3Vy8Y.name: Rare Ancient Spear

FakbevHIL3.description: The taser gun can temporarily stun zombies, but it has a relatively long cooldown. Can also move objects.
FakbevHIL3.name: Taser Gun

oQOSkx7Oe6.description: Useful item. Press E while holding to ride (yes, ride!! - press E to re-equip as normal)
oQOSkx7Oe6.name: Broom

H3BO7Q8OQY.description: The Spearfish is a Swordfish on steroids. 1 in 10 chance of getting it when buying Swordfish.
H3BO7Q8OQY.name: Rare Spearfish

Evnh2TBcpx.description: Shoots powerful potatoes for 25 points each. Recently Buffed
Evnh2TBcpx.name: Dev Potato Gun

psfbO1cMpG.description: Shoots baked potatoes for 50 points each!
psfbO1cMpG.name: Hot Potato Gun

MFzwfJANZq.description: This heavy pickaxe can be used to dig up crystals and to build defences.
MFzwfJANZq.name: Pickaxe

veeuVQSLNz.description: This magical crystal gives +3 speed and +100 zoom to whoever holds it! (there can be only one crystal)
veeuVQSLNz.name: Mystic Crystal

textB.textB:
,

Welcome to braains.io!
[H] to open this again

Controls:
[WASD] or [Arrow Keys] to move
[Mouse] to rotate
[Left Click] to use item
[B] to buy item
[E] to pickup item on ground
[G] to drop item from your hotbar to the ground
[Z] to teleport to spawn (for zombies only, 60s cooldown)

You must be logged in to use the following feature:
[ENTER] to open and send chat message

You can register an account by click the top left 'MENU' button and clicking 'Login'. Need help? Click the Discord icon below the 'Play' button!

Badges (next to name): ‚≠ê = Verified Youtuber, üî™ = Moderator, üî® = Developer

Have fun!
‚Äî Devs

actions.comment: Incognito mode for those who want it. Press Y to show normal username.

then.htmlContent: You might want to use that a little less. The game is getting laggy!
You might want to use that a little less. The game is getting laggy!
You might want to use that a little less. The game is getting laggy!

actions.comment: deprecated in favor of more condensed script above

textB.textA: to display all. If you got here on accident, simply quit. To open again, tap

htmlContent.textB: Created by QiNG-agar for upkeep, testing, or event purposes
Created by QiNG-agar for upkeep, testing, or event purposes
Created by QiNG-agar for upkeep, testing, or event purposes

then.inputLabel: This action will KICK ALL NON-STAFF PLAYERS (not just guests). Type CONFIRM to proceed

then.htmlContent:
You were disconnected as part of a mass-kick by one of our mods. YOU ARE NOT BANNED AND CAN SIMPLY REFRESH

Recently, braains.io has been facing intense DDOSing at the hands of bot accounts. To make the process of removing these bots simpler, our mods have the option of kicking all guest users below a certain score.

We understand our filter may not be perfectly accurate, and if you're reading this, chances are, you're a human, and we apologize for the inconvenience.

Consider making an account at www.modd.io

else.message: Error score must be a number `kickguest `

else.value: No player with that username found

else.message: You need to be holding kickWand to use this command!

rigidspeed: false -> true (your speed is now static and is abnormal)
rigidhitbox: true -> false (your hitbox now changes and is abnormal)
Changed unit type to Human + changed player type to Human
Changed unit type to Zombie + changed player type to Zombie
Changed unit type to Zombie King + changed player type to Zombie

rigidhitbox: false -> true (your hitbox is now static and is normal)

That argument is not a unit! Please see `list` for acceptable arguments. Bear in mind that the console is caps-sensitive.

rigidspeed: true -> false (your speed now changes and is normal)

else.message: rigidspeed: false -> true (your speed is now static and abnormal)

then.message: rigidhitbox: true -> false (your hitbox now changes and is abnormal)

else.message: rigidhitbox: false -> true (your hitbox is now static and normal)

htmlContent.textA: p-list ‚Äî lists all available options for the `p-set ` parameter.

then.htmlContent:
Your score was set to -9000
Please note that -9000 score result in 0 speed if rigidspeed is 'false'.
-9000 score also renders you completely invisible since your body scale is 0.
If rigidHitbox is 'true', your body scale is 0, which means your unit has no bounds and cannot interact with anything. This may prevent movement no matter what settings are active.
You can use the `setspeed <value>` action to move at this score, note this will also set rigidspeed as 'true'

textB.textA: ] does not exist (unitTypeGroup does not contain parameter).
textB.textB: Use `p-list` in modal to list all acceptable parameters

Changed your name. It is the name of a verified user; verified badge added to unit name

else.message: Changed your name. Unit name changed to player name
Error unit type of selected unit must be Human: `ghostify`. Use `become Human` to become human.

then.text: what are you doing in my swamp?

elementListBody1.default:
command <required param> [op. param] [op1 | op2 | op3]; KEYBIND.

This is page 1 of 2 command list. Use list 2 to view 2nd page.

list 1 — list all commands p.1 (this text) MOD

** Info Class **
list [page] — list all commands (this text) MOD
view — display all setup values currently active MOD
reveal — displays all masked users and their apparent usernames MOD
p-list — lists all available options for the p-set <object> parameter. DEV

** Set Class **
p-set <object> — set spawn object for P command DEV
setscore <value> — set score (can go negative) DEV
setspeed <value> — set speed (can go above max + also sets rigidspeed to 'true') DEV
setzoom <value | default> — set zoom value. DEV
setcursor <value> — set cursor id. 1=default, 2=physics (stable), 3=deleteDebris (stable), 4=minionControl (BETA), 5=physicsStack (nuts) DEV
setminionick <value> — set minion nickname (BETA) DEV

** Boolean Attribute Lock Class **
rigidhitbox — updates body scale instead of sprite scale based on points every second. DEV
rigidspeed — locks speed at value regardless of points. Can go higher than max. DEV

** Manipulation **
become <Zombie | Zombie King | Human | Box> — Become a unit (changes playertype to zombie for zombie units, human for human and Box units. sets rigidhitbox as true and rigidspeed as true but these can be turned off) DEV
destroyminions — delete all owned minion units (BETA) DEV

elementListBody2.default:
command <required param> [op. param] [op1 | op2 | op3]; KEYBIND.

This is page 2 of 2 command list. Use list 1 or just list to view 1st page.

** GET Class **
getitem <item> — be given new item, item DEV

** Moderation **
muteall — mutes all non-staff players currently ingame. MOD
unmuteall — unmutes all non-staff players currently ingame. MOD
kickall — kicks all non-staff players currently ingame (FOR BOTS, USE kickguest. Only use kickall to reset server) MOD
kickguest <maxScore> — kicks all guest users with less than maxScore points. MOD

** Appearance **
toggle spectator — spectate / unspectate. Resets points. MOD
nick [value] — Change your apparent username DEV
ghostify — unit interacts with nothing. Must be human. DEV

** Global Flags **
--devActionVisible <true/false> — exhibit fading text effects on devAction (def: false) DEV
--maxDebrisStrict <true/false> — prohibit admin-spawning of debris past 150 total unit count (def: true) DEV
--modsIncognitoDisabled <true/false> — reveal all staff and disable incognito Y (def: false) DEV
--testingMode <true/false> — locks the server from incoming new non-staff joins (def: false) DEV

** Extra **
SPACE — Open console MOD
# [value] — send private chat message to all staff MOD
@ [value] — server broadcast message (to all players) DEV

elementListMod.default:
command <required param> [op. param] [op1 | op2 | op3]; KEYBIND.

list — list all commands (this text) MOD

** Info Class **
list — list all commands (this text) MOD
view — display all setup values currently active MOD
reveal — displays all masked users and their apparent usernames MOD
smw [player] — show warning message to player MOD
viewcmdlogs — view all commands used by all moderators MOD
viewlogs [player] — view player's chat history MOD
viewlogs all — view entire chat history MOD

** Moderation **
muteall — mutes all non-staff players currently ingame. MOD
unmuteall — unmutes all non-staff players currently ingame. MOD
kickall — kicks all non-staff players currently ingame (FOR BOTS, USE kickguest. Only use kickall to reset server) MOD
kickguest <maxScore> — kicks all guest users with less than maxScore points. MOD

** Extra **
SPACE — Open console MOD
# [value] — send private chat message to all staff MOD
